refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o fmmetal.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kfreq = 440 kvdepth = 0 kvrate = 0 ifn1 = 1 ifn2 = 2 ifn3 = 2 ifn4 = 1 ivfn = 1 kc2 = p5
kc1 line p4, p3, 1 asig fmmetal .5, kfreq, kc1, kc2, kvdepth, kvrate, ifn1, ifn2, ifn3, ifn4, ivfn outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> ; sine wave. f 1 0 32768 10 1 ; the "twopeaks.aiff" audio file. f 2 0 256 1 "twopeaks.aiff" 0 0 0
i 1 0 4 6 5 i 1 5 4 .2 10 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
